item.title: Drawing Pictures in Desmos
item.description: I was messing around with various APIs and I stumbled across a feature in Desmos that allows you to place a colored pixel anywhere on the graph. I instantly wanted to set up a script that would draw out an image. I decided to start small and make an apple.
